ygData.msgSnippet: I must be the only one blase about the whole situation. I don t see anything really outrageous in today s news except it happened on American soil. Sure it

I must be the only one blase about the whole situation. I don't see 
anything really outrageous in today's news except it happened on 
American soil. Sure it sucks that it happened and a LOT of people may 
be dead, but stuff like this happens all the time in the middle east. 
North America is just another target and it's bound to happen again.

 Then again people have said it's the worst thing to happen since 
Pearl Harbour. Ah well. Take yer pick.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
